dataSet.name: AccountBalances
dataSet.query:
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // Define list of mandatory balance divisions and sections SELECT "Assets" AS Division, "Current Assets" AS Section, 1 AS SectionOrder INTO BalanceSections UNION ALL SELECT "Assets", "Noncurrent Assets", 2 UNION ALL SELECT "Liabilities and Stockholder Equity", "Current Liabilities", 3 UNION ALL SELECT "Liabilities and Stockholder Equity", "Long Term Liabilities", 4 UNION ALL SELECT "Liabilities and Stockholder Equity", "Stockholder Equity", 5;
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // Select balances by the balance sections for ends of selected periods SELECT ALLOWED Companies.Ref AS OurCompany, BalanceSections.Division, BalanceSections.Section, BalanceSections.SectionOrder, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.AccountType AS AccountType, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.Account AS Account, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.DayPeriod AS DayPeriod, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.WeekPeriod AS WeekPeriod, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.MonthPeriod AS MonthPeriod, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.QuarterPeriod AS QuarterPeriod, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.YearPeriod AS YearPeriod, CASE WHEN (NOT GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.Account IS NULL) THEN GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountRCClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountRCBalance, CASE WHEN (NOT GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.Account IS NULL) THEN GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountRCOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountRCOpeningBalance {SELECT AccountType.*, Account.*, YearPeriod, QuarterPeriod, MonthPeriod, WeekPeriod, DayPeriod} FROM BalanceSections AS BalanceSections LEFT JOIN AccountingRegister.GeneralJournal.BalanceAndTurnovers(,, Auto, RegisterRecordsAndPeriodBoundaries,,,) AS GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers ON // Define balance sections for all of CASE WHEN GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.AccountType IN (VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Bank), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Inventory), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.AccountsReceivable), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherCurrentAsset)) THEN "Current Assets" WHEN GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.AccountType IN (VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.FixedAsset), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.AccumulatedDepreciation), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherNoncurrentAsset)) THEN "Noncurrent Assets" WHEN GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.AccountType IN (VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.AccountsPayable), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherCurrentLiability)) THEN "Current Liabilities" WHEN GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.AccountType IN (VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.LongTermLiability)) THEN "Long Term Liabilities" WHEN GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.AccountType IN (VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Equity)) THEN "Stockholder Equity" // Net Income (accumulated) section in Stockholder Equity WHEN GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.AccountType IN (VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Income), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.CostOfSales), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Expense), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherIncome), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherExpense)) THEN "Stockholder Equity" ELSE NULL END = BalanceSections.Section // Our company for a possible multicompany accounting in a future LEFT JOIN Catalog.Companies AS Companies ON (Companies.Ref = VALUE(Catalog.Companies.OurCompany)) {WHERE GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.Account.AccountType AS AccountType, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.Account AS Account, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.YearPeriod AS YearPeriod, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.QuarterPeriod AS QuarterPeriod, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.MonthPeriod AS MonthPeriod, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.WeekPeriod AS WeekPeriod, GeneralJournalBalanceAndTurnovers.DayPeriod AS DayPeriod}
